body: If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga.
Could you translate this to english?
I miss in the early 90s when in a anime / manga that have rape in it the bad guy would die in the end

Based from what I see here the short black hair dark elf is probably the child of the dark elf queen, while the silver haired dark elf with the mask was trained(you know what I mean) by the dark elf queen.
